review: No more or no less than I expected. I already have Netflix and it seems that if I want anything more current, I have to pay for it even though I have a Prime account!
author: Shel Kirchner

review: The fire stick is excellent !  I own 2 now.  The wireless reception is excellent.  I actually have one installed on my new  Sharp 70" Aquos Smart TV because the TV only gets 2 bars on the wifi causing it to buffer a lot on Pandora.  Firestick never skips, freezes, or buffers. It is redicules that I have to install a firestick on a smart TV.  It also has many more apps preloaded on it than the smart TV.  For $39 it is a great buy,  and I could have saved at least couple hundred dollars buying a 'dumb' TV using the Firestick.
author: Karl Maurer

review: Easy to install. Works great sometimes some of the programming pauses (ShowtimeGO) or just does not work (Fox Sports) . However I do not think that has anything to do with the Fire TV Stick.
author: Martin Torres

review: Super awesome has everything I need in one place.
author: Jayson

review: This is our second stick. Great item to have!
author: Karen M. Daley "musclemadness"
